solution_line_template: The remaining number of cookies is {total_cookies}-{cookies_eaten_by_adults} = <<{total_cookies}-{cookies_eaten_by_adults}={remaining_cookies}>>{remaining_cookies} cookies.
If the children divided the cookies equally, each child got {remaining_cookies}/{num_children} = <<{remaining_cookies}/{num_children}={cookies_per_child}>>{cookies_per_child} cookies
